As you advance, you can unlock different buttons, cursors, themes, and music. This free game is available on mobile devices and computers, providing fun for all.
games.howToPlayText:
Click Click Clicker is as true to the clicker genre as it gets. You‚Äôre clicking a button to click another button. Click the button, upgrade your abilities, and get shiny new buttons for your hard work.

Like many clicker games, you start with one humble click. With each click, you generate cash to buy upgrades. Those upgrades include an increase in your passive ability to earn money, the amount of cash you earn per click, or the number of cursors you have.

Click Click Clicker is all about getting shiny new things with minimal effort. You can customize everything in this game: backgrounds, music, cursor, and buttons. But you have to put in the work to unlock them first! Keep clicking or coast along on your idle earnings until you get there.

games.description:
Craftsman Land ‚Äì build your own farm and help the town recover!

Craftsman Land is a farming and crafting game where your goal is to rebuild the inherited land, expand your farm, and support the local community.

After a devastating flood, the town is in ruins. As the heir to the land, it‚Äôs up to you to restore your farm, help the townsfolk, and bring life back to the surrounding villages. Grow crops like corn and onions, go fishing, and construct new buildings such as a house, chicken coop, and cowshed. Inside your home, you can decorate and design the interior to your liking.

Take care of your animals ‚Äì feed chickens and cows, collect fresh eggs and milk, and use them for crafting or trading. Complete quests for local people, trade with merchants, and produce a wide variety of items thanks to the crafting system. Improve your skills, specialize in your favorite activities, and become a true master craftsman.

The world of Craftsman Land is constantly growing with new places, tasks, and adventures waiting to be discovered
games.howToPlayText:
In Craftsman Land, playing is simple and intuitive. On mobile devices you tap the screen, while on PC you use the mouse. Actions are performed automatically ‚Äì all you need are the required items and resources. With just a click, you can trigger different activities such as building houses, crafting tools, or producing goods.

Complete quests given by townsfolk to earn rewards and progress in the story. When you run out of quests, head to the crossroads where the bulletin board offers an endless supply of new tasks.

Explore the map to visit different shops:

Building materials store ‚Äì get everything you need for construction.

Tool shop ‚Äì find useful equipment for your farm.

Gardening store ‚Äì buy seeds and expand your fields.

Not everything has to be bought! Many materials can be produced by yourself. Chop wood, fire clay into bricks at the campfire, and create other essential resources to use in crafting and construction.

Grow crops, raise animals, trade, and craft your way to success while helping the entire town thrive!

games.howToPlayText:

Drag planes to the correct locations, refuel, repair, and board passengers as you handle the growing traffic. Ensure safe landings and takeoffs, all while managing the resources of your busy airport. Pause - P

games.title: StickerBall
games.description:
Stickerball is a fast-paced game where you collect stickers using a ball with unique abilities! Your goal is to collect 180 colorful stickers across 9 levels by completing challenges and activating triggers that change the game‚Äôs rules. Each turn, 10 stickers fly onto the field from a purchased pack, but any uncollected ones disappear‚Äîact quickly and precisely!

The game shines with 14 dynamic triggers: freeze stickers, double rewards with "x2," turn the ball into a magnet or ghost, activate "disco" mode, or control a dual ball! The more stickers you collect in one turn, the higher your combo and the more coins you earn. Holo-stickers, with their unique designs, grant double the currency!

Play across 12 vibrant, randomly changing fields. Buy sticker packs, upgrade your collection, and strategize by activating triggers at the perfect moment to maximize rewards.
games.howToPlayText:
How to play:
1. Aiming:
Move your cursor to aim-the arrow on the ball shows the strike direction.

2. Power Charging:
Hold LMB to fill the arrow‚Äôs power gauge. Release to launch the ball! Striking too early cancels the shot.

3. Collecting Stickers:
After striking, the ball bounces off walls, collecting stickers, coins, and crystals. The more you gather in one turn, the higher your combo and bonuses!

4. Triggers:
Collect special icons (magnet, x2, freeze, etc.) to power up the ball or alter sticker behavior. For example, "Ghost" lets the ball pass through triggers, while "Double Move" grants a second strike without new stickers appearing.

5. Buying Packs:
Before your first turn, choose a free Level 1 pack. Each pack contains 100 stickers, with 10 appearing per turn.

6. Strategy Tips:
Use "Freeze" or "Bonus" to increase the number of stickers on the field.
Combine triggers like "Magnet" + "x2" for double rewards.
Prioritize Holo-stickers - they grant x2 coins!

games.title: Raised Knight
games.description:
Get ready for the adventure in "Raised Knight," the endless runner where your skills will be put to the test!
Run through a world full of obstacles while trying to cover as much distance as possible. Every move counts, so make sure you master the controls!
games.howToPlayText:
Get ready for the adventure in "Raised Knight," the endless runner where your skills will be put to the test!
Run through a world full of obstacles while trying to cover as much distance as possible. Every move counts, so make sure you master the controls!

[A] / [D] ‚Üí Move:
Use [A] and [D] to move left or right. Dodge obstacles, take advantage of openings, and be prepared for any challenge that comes your way. Your agility is key!

[Space] ‚Üí Jump / Float:
Hold down the [Space] key to jump or float. Jump over obstacles or float in the air to avoid dangers that cross your path. Air control can be the difference between success and failure!

[Ctrl] ‚Üí Slide:
Use [Ctrl] to slide under obstacles and save yourself from critical situations. Slide quickly to pass under low obstacles and keep advancing without missing a beat.
